comment.author: 8938206@N04
comment._content: Linda Foto Gostaria muito que você se juntasse a nós do grupo APRENDIZ BRASIL e fizesse parte dessa grande escola! Como MESTRE ou APRENDIZ! Um grande abraço! belissima sépia.parabens.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: I'm puzzled by the combination of dates:  Gasparo, Oronzo, 1903-1969; and 1920 as suggested date.  In 1920, Gasparo would have been 17; neither father nor son is close to that age.  But a studio photo of Gasparo at the age of the father would surely have been very different.  Is the son  Oronzo the artist and the picture therefore around 1910?  Of course, father and son could have the same name.
